description:
This is a collection of boolean logic tasks with multiple variables. In moste cases you must build logical clauses with 'and' and 'or' to achive the correct outcome, but also grupe your logic using paranthesis.
Pay attention to the information you are given and write logic that conforms to the variables you are given and the end goal

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either variable A is true or both variables B and C are true
tasks.info: You can combine the logical AND (&&) and OR (||) operators to create more complex conditions.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either both variables D and E are true, or variable F is false
tasks.info: Parentheses can be used to group conditions and control the order of operations.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if both variable G is true and either variable H or I is true
tasks.info: You can nest conditions within each other for more complex logic.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either variable J is false or both variables K and L are false
tasks.info: You can combine the logical AND (&&) and OR (||) operators to create more complex conditions.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either both variables M and N are false, or variable O is true
tasks.info: Parentheses can be used to group conditions and control the order of operations.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if both variable P is false and either variable Q or R is false
tasks.info: You can nest conditions within each other for more complex logic.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either variable S is true or both variables T and U are not false
tasks.info: You can combine the logical AND (&&) and OR (||) operators to create more complex conditions.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either both variables V and W are not false, or variable X is not true
tasks.info: Parentheses can be used to group conditions and control the order of operations.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if both variable Y is not false and either variable Z or A1 is not false
tasks.info: You can nest conditions within each other for more complex logic.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either variable B1 is not true or both variables C1 and D1 are not true
tasks.info: You can combine the logical AND (&&) and OR (||) operators to create more complex conditions.
